P

Used to draw the entities such as the main character, enemies, map, and rewards
pauseState - Variable in class main.GamePanel
 
pickUpObject(int) - Method in class Entities.MainCharacterTV
Checks what the object that was picked up If it was a battery power up, the main character's life will increase and the battery will disappear If it was a puddle (trap), the main character's life will become 0 and the game will end If it was a keycard, then the main character will be able to leave the level

run() - Method in class main.GamePanel
